attributes.action: Place in the public domain ALL CCTV and other photographic evidence used in the Lee Rigby murder trial.
attributes.additional_details: It is IMPERATIVE that all of the people of this land can see what Islamic fundamentalists are capable of and likely to do to them, given the opportunity.  The people MUST be given the information to better allow them to be able to defend themselves against it, something our government is unable or, most likely, unwilling to do.
